automatedPolicyAvailability.policyName: Private endpoint should be enabled for PostgreSQL servers
automatedPolicyAvailability.policyDescription: Private endpoint connections enforce secure communication by enabling private connectivity to Azure Database for PostgreSQL. Configure a private endpoint connection to enable access to traffic coming only from known networks and prevent access from all other IP addresses, including within Azure.

automatedPolicyAvailability.policyName: Public network access should be disabled for PostgreSQL servers
automatedPolicyAvailability.policyDescription: Disable the public network access property to improve security and ensure your Azure Database for PostgreSQL can only be accessed from a private endpoint. This configuration disables access from any public address space outside of Azure IP range, and denies all logins that match IP or virtual network-based firewall rules.
